games.anarchy

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • joueur.BaseGameObject
      • games.anarchy.GameObject
        • games.anarchy.Player

  • public class Player
extends GameObject
    A player in this game. Every AI controls one player.

    • Field Detail

      • bribesRemaining

        public int bribesRemaining
        How many bribes this player has remaining to use during their turn. Each action a Building does costs 1 bribe. Any unused bribes are lost at the end of the player's turn.

      • buildings

        public java.util.List<Building> buildings
        All the buildings owned by this player.

      • clientType

        public java.lang.String clientType
        What type of client this is, e.g. 'Python', 'JavaScript', or some other language. For potential data mining purposes.

      • fireDepartments

        public java.util.List<FireDepartment> fireDepartments
        All the FireDepartments owned by this player.

      • headquarters

        public Warehouse headquarters
        The Warehouse that serves as this player's headquarters and has extra health. If this gets destroyed they lose.

      • lost

        public boolean lost
        If the player lost the game or not.

      • name

        public java.lang.String name
        The name of the player.

      • opponent

        public Player opponent
        This player's opponent in the game.

      • policeDepartments

        public java.util.List<PoliceDepartment> policeDepartments
        All the PoliceDepartments owned by this player.

      • reasonLost

        public java.lang.String reasonLost
        The reason why the player lost the game.

      • reasonWon

        public java.lang.String reasonWon
        The reason why the player won the game.

      • timeRemaining

        public double timeRemaining
        The amount of time (in ns) remaining for this AI to send commands.

      • warehouses

        public java.util.List<Warehouse> warehouses
        All the warehouses owned by this player. Includes the Headquarters.

      • weatherStations

        public java.util.List<WeatherStation> weatherStations
        All the WeatherStations owned by this player.

      • won

        public boolean won
        If the player won the game or not.
